name: Rocket Rash - Online Multiplayer
description:
Online multiplayer game played between two teams. Cut your opponent team players tail to make your tail longer. Team with longest total tail length wins.

How to control: There are two control modes :

  1. Three button control (Default): use Top, left and right arrow keys to control the player object.
  2. Two button control: use Left and Right arrow keys to control left and right thruster manually to control the attitude of your player object. This is slightly difficult compared to the previous mode but more fun.

Settings icon to chose your control mode is located at bottom-right corner of the home screen.

Objective:

Game is played between two teams.

At the start of each round, both teams get equal length of tail distributed evenly among the team players.

When a player cuts the tail of a player from the other team, equal length gets added to its own tail.

Score of each team is the sum of tail lengths of all the team players.

The game supports maximum of 8 players in a room at the moment. This limit may be increased after sufficient testing.
